trans-unit.source: Represents the base class for many visual elements of the chart such as the legend, title, and chart areas.
trans-unit.target: 表示图表的许多可视元素（如图例、标题和图表区域）的基类。

trans-unit.source: Defines the position of the chart element in relative coordinates, which range from (0,0) to (100,100).
trans-unit.target: 定义图表元素在相对坐标中的位置，范围从 (0,0) 到 (100,100)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition> class is used to define the position of a chart element, and represents one rectangle using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Y%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition>类可用于定义图表元素的位置，并表示一个矩形使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.X%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Y%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Width%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Height%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition> class is always exposed as a `Position` property, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition>类始终作为公开`Position`属性，如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Position%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: It is also exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control as a property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 它还公开了<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PrePaint>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PostPaint>的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>控件的属性作为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartPaintEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: The position of the applicable chart elements can be set automatically by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A> property to `true`; chart elements can also be positioned at design time in the Design View.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置自动集适用的图表元素的位置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>属性`true`; 也可以在设计时在设计视图中定位的图表元素。

trans-unit.source: There are two major differences between this class and a <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> structure:
trans-unit.target: 有两个此类之间的主要差异和<xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>结构：

trans-unit.source: This class can use automatic positioning.
trans-unit.target: 此类可以使用自动定位。

trans-unit.source: This class only uses coordinates ranging from 0 to 100, otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此类仅使用范围从 0 到 100 的坐标，否则引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The position of chart elements is described using relative coordinates, with the top-left corner of an element having coordinates of (0,0) and the bottom-right corner of an element having coordinates of (100,100).
trans-unit.target: 元素的坐标为 (0，0) 的左上角和右下角的坐标为 (100100) 的元素中使用相对坐标，描述的图表元素的位置。

trans-unit.source: Elements that are plotted within a chart area use coordinates that are relative to the chart area, whereas elements outside a chart area use coordinates that are relative to the chart image.
trans-unit.target: 绘制图表区域中的元素使用相对于图表区的坐标，而图表区之外的元素使用相对于图表图像的坐标。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The X position of the top-left corner of the chart control.
trans-unit.target: 图表控件左上角的 X 位置。

trans-unit.source: The Y position of the top-left corner of the chart control.
trans-unit.target: 图表控件左上角的 Y 位置。

trans-unit.source: The width of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The height of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素的高度。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> class with the specified <paramref name="x" />, <paramref name="y" />, <paramref name="width" /> and <paramref name="height" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的 <paramref name="x" />、<paramref name="y" />、<paramref name="width" /> 和 <paramref name="height" /> 参数初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an applicable chart element will be positioned automatically by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart" /> 控件是否自动定位适用图表元素。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if an applicable chart element will be positioned automatically by the chart control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果适用的图表元素将由图表控件自动放置，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to automatically position a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性可自动定位图表元素。

trans-unit.source: For example, to position the legend automatically, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要自动定位图例，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend.Position%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Auto%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bottom position of a chart element, in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 获取图表元素在相对坐标中的底部位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> value that represents the relative position of the bottom of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="float" /> 值，该值表示图表元素底部的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: The bottom of the chart element is always expressed in relative coordinates, and is either relative to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object if plotted within a chart area, or relative to the entire chart image if plotted outside of a chart area element.
trans-unit.target: 图表元素底部始终以相对坐标表示和则相对于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象如果绘制在图表区，或相对于整个图表图像，如果图表区域元素之外绘制。

trans-unit.source: Chart coordinates use (0,0) for a top-left corner, and (100,100) for a bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 图表右下角坐标以及左上角 (100100) 的使用 (0，0)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure used to initialize the element position object.
trans-unit.target: 用于初始化元素位置对象的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> object from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 通过 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> 结构初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图表元素的高度。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> value that represents the height of the chart element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="float" /> 值，该值表示图表元素的高度。

trans-unit.source: Always uses relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 始终使用相对坐标。

trans-unit.source: If you set a value outside of the 0-100 pixel range, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置的值超过 0-100 个像素范围的情况下将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets the position of the right side of a chart element, in relative coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 获取图表元素的右侧在相对坐标中的位置。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> value that represents the relative position of the right side of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="float" /> 值，该值表示图表元素右侧的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that represents the relative position of the right side of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，表示右端的适用的图表元素的相对位置。

trans-unit.source: The right side position is always expressed in relative coordinates, and is either relative to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object if plotted within a chart area, or relative to the entire chart image if plotted outside of a chart area element.
trans-unit.target: 右侧位置始终以相对坐标表示和则相对于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象如果绘制在图表区，或相对于整个图表图像，如果图表区域元素之外绘制。

trans-unit.source: Chart coordinates use (0,0) for a top-left corner, and (100,100) for a bottom-right corner.
trans-unit.target: 图表右下角坐标以及左上角 (100100) 的使用 (0，0)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the size of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取图表元素的大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> value that represents the size of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.SizeF" /> 值，该值表示图表元素的大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> object that uses the coordinates of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 对象，该对象使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition" /> 对象的坐标。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> structure that represents the coordinates of an element position object.
trans-unit.target: 表示元素位置对象的坐标的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.RectangleF" /> 结构。

trans-unit.source: This method converts the position of an element to a <xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将转换到元素的位置<xref:System.Drawing.RectangleF>结构。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图表元素的宽度。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> value that represents the width of a chart element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="float" /> 值，该值表示图表元素的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This property always uses relative coordinates; if you set a value outside the 0-100 pixel range, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终使用相对坐标;如果你设置的值超出了 0-100 个像素范围的情况下将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative X-coordinate of the top-left corner of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置适用图表元素左上角的相对 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> value that represents the X-coordinate of the top-left corner of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="float" /> 值，该值表示适用图表元素左上角的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.X%2A> property is always expressed in relative coordinates, and is either relative to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object if plotted within a chart area, or relative to the entire chart image if plotted outside of a chart area element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.X%2A>属性始终以相对坐标表示，并且是相对于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象如果绘制在图表区，或相对于整个图表图像，如果图表区域元素之外绘制。

trans-unit.source: This property always uses relative coordinates; if you set a value outside the 0-100 pixel range, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终使用相对坐标;如果你设置的值超出了 0-100 个像素范围的情况下将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative Y-coordinate of the top-left corner of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置适用图表元素左上角的相对 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="float" /> value that represents the Y-coordinate of the top-left corner of an applicable chart element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see langword="float" /> 值，该值表示适用图表元素左上角的 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Y%2A> property is always expressed in relative coordinates, and is either relative to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object if plotted within a chart area, or relative to the entire chart image if plotted outside of a chart area element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ElementPosition.Y%2A>属性始终以相对坐标表示，并且是相对于<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>对象如果绘制在图表区，或相对于整个图表图像，如果图表区域元素之外绘制。

trans-unit.source: This property always uses relative coordinates; if you set a value outside the 0-100 pixel range, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终使用相对坐标;如果你设置的值超出了 0-100 个像素范围的情况下将引发异常。
